import { useRouter } from 'next/router' import store from '../../redux/store' import Slider from '../../components/Slider' const Game = () => { const router = useRouter() const { slug, id } = router.query const item = store.getState().items.filter(x => x.id == id)[0] console.log(item) return

{item.name}

} export default Game
